## Description {#details}

Helper to allow for parsing of an entire .debug&#95;line section in sequence.

Definition at line 320 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h">DWARFDebugLine.h</a>.

### done() {#a7e5c446ca1815572129350430952b352}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::DWARFDebugLine::SectionParser::done () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Indicates if the parser has parsed as much as possible.

:::info
Certain problems with the line table structure might mean that parsing stops before the end of the section is reached.
:::

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h/#l00356">356</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h">DWARFDebugLine.h</a>.

### parseNext() {#a2aff9132f17cfa81416637e4f0cb7a84}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DWARFDebugLine::LineTable DWARFDebugLine::SectionParser::parseNext (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt; void(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a>)&gt; RecoverableErrorHandler, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt; void(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a>)&gt; UnrecoverableErrorHandler, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &#42; OS=nullptr, bool Verbose=false)</>}>
Get the next line table from the section.

Report any issues via the handlers.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="RecoverableErrorHandler">- any issues that don&#39;t prevent further parsing of the table will be reported through this handler.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="UnrecoverableErrorHandler">- any issues that prevent further parsing of the table will be reported through this handler.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="OS">- if not null, the parser will print information about the table as it parses it.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Verbose">- if true, the parser will print verbose information when printing to the output.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h/#l00338">338</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h">DWARFDebugLine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-cpp/#l01565">1565</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-cpp">DWARFDebugLine.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### skip() {#a000c5f6938f0b10629a86b31c84c5abc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DWARFDebugLine::SectionParser::skip (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt; void(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a>)&gt; RecoverableErrorHandler, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt; void(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a>)&gt; UnrecoverableErrorHandler)</>}>
Skip the current line table and go to the following line table (if present) immediately.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="RecoverableErrorHandler">- report any recoverable prologue parsing issues via this handler.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="UnrecoverableErrorHandler">- report any unrecoverable prologue parsing issues via this handler.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h/#l00349">349</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h">DWARFDebugLine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-cpp/#l01581">1581</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-cpp">DWARFDebugLine.cpp</a>.
